public.politicaseguranca.p1: The Auctioning Portal uses an SSL (Secure Socket Layer) security provided by international Unicert BRAZIL CERTIFIER . This system is the most advanced that exists and has maximum encryption level ( 256-bit AES -256 ), ie , all User data is encrypted before being transmitted to the Internet, both the User microcomputer as the Auctioning Portal servers , making its totally private data. The certificate used by the Auctioning Portal is also a signature server , which grants the User access to the correct server and not to some other cloned server ( Phishing ) . This SSL key system is the same security system used by major financial institutions operating in the country.
